SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text:
With the Calamity begun at last, we must now
welcome the Watcher to Pulchra. Make public
your honest feelings, Sages, for they will
be needed to summon the Watcher hence.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I have come to convey the feelings of the black
witches. The fight against the Calamity is a
fight for witches alone; we have no need for a
stranger from another world to watch over us.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text:
The bigger our audience, the more exciting this
will be—so let us ensure the sight of we red
witches doing battle is forever seared into
the Watcher's memory! That said, we will not tolerate any
who might interfere in our struggle.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text:
When comes the Calamity, so comes the Watcher.
This is the way of the world, and the witches of
white obey the natural order of things. We say it
is time to welcome the Watcher with open arms.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text:
The witches of the yellow care not.
If you wish to summon the Watcher,
do as you will. It has naught to do with us.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BlueWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text:
The Calamity is the way of Pulchra—part of the
workings of eternity. And if the Watcher be a
part of that cycle, we must practice acceptance. When the Calamity is ended, the Watcher
will depart. This is the way of it,
and all we have to say on the matter.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I thank you all for your wise words,
and hold faith that your feelings will
beckon the Watcher to this land.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text:
I'm so excited for the war with the
Calamity, I almost can't stand it!

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text:
Such an annoying viewpoint.
But it's not as if we have a choice.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.speaker: BlueWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_0.text: I wonder how many will survive.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_1.text: Let it be a beautiful battle.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_1.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_DISASTER_000_CUT_000_1.text:
Whether the victor be the witches or the
Calamity, there is but a single result.
There is only the fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA01_000_CUT_0.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA01_000_CUT_0.text:
This cycle's Calamity is crystallization.
And while I know not the true form of it,
there will likely be many chances during
the war for study.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA01_010_CUT_0.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA01_010_CUT_0.text:
Just a little more, and we'll be able to
destroy all the crystals. Victory is close
at hand, so don't do any strange meddling.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA02_000_CUT_0.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA02_000_CUT_0.text:
While the intensity of that fiend spawned
by the crystals is incredible, I want to put
a stop to it here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA02_010_CUT_0.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA02_010_CUT_0.text:
We managed to push the crystals back,
but can't let our guard down.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA03_000_CUT_0.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA03_000_CUT_0.text:
If we don't hold our ground, Castle Black Swan
will be consumed by crystals—which will spell
the end of all witches of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA_000_CUT_010.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA_000_CUT_010.text:
We cannot lose in the presence
of the Watcher.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA03_000_CUT_0.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLACK_AREA03_000_CUT_0.text:
Damn your soul, Watcher!
Are you a secret pawn of the Calamity!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_CL.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_CL.text:
Ah, yes. Do you recall what sort of fiend
had its sights set on Castle Black Swan?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_CL.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_CL.text:
You fought on the black battlefield?
But how, when you are not a witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_CL.speaker: BlackWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLACK_CL.text:
Ah, yes. I also thought there were quite
a few earth fiends. But thanks to this,
I now understand that I must obtain the
aid of the witches of the blue.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA01_000_CUT_000.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA01_000_CUT_000.text:
At last, the battle of the red witches begins.
I've been looking forward to this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA01_010_CUT_000.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA01_010_CUT_000.text:
Over so soon? Oh, but I feel so empty...
Where is the thrill? The joy?
The exuberance of victory?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA02_000_CUT_000.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA02_000_CUT_000.text:
These crystal fiends are worthy opponents
to the last. Truly we stand on the field of
battle with the Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA02_010_CUT_000.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA02_010_CUT_000.text:
The red witches will never know defeat;
that was just a taste of our strength!

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA03_000_CUT_000.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA03_000_CUT_000.text:
Behind us stands the Flame Fortress—yet we
have not been cornered, for this is where
the true battle begins. Now look on in awe as I captivate you
with the sight of the witches of the red
fighting for true!

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Did you see, Watcher? You have borne
witness to the ferocity of the red!

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA_000_CUT_020_0.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA_000_CUT_020_0.text: You robbed us of our victory!

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA03_000_CUT_010.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_RED_AREA03_000_CUT_010.text:
So the role of the Watcher is to snatch
away our deserving victory? Fie!

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.text:
Surely you observed closely the fiends
being fought, Watcher? I would have
you tell me what you saw.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.speaker: HERO
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.text: They had the power of earth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.speaker: HERO
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.text: They had the power of water.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.text:
You're failing to watch our opponents closely!
Those enemies instead have the power of water,
and we are at a disadvantage against them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED_CLEA.text:
Well seen! It's key to watch a foe closely.
Our enemies do indeed have the power of water,
which puts us at a disadvantage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA01_000_CUT_.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA01_000_CUT_.text:
The crystals are borne of the earth,
and may prove a most difficult foe
for us yellow witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA01_010_CUT_.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA01_010_CUT_.text:
The crystals crumble and are returned
to the earth. I sense a new beginning!

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA02_000_CUT_.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA02_000_CUT_.text:
The power of the earth alone can't hold
back the crystallization process.
What are we to do?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA02_010_CUT_.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA02_010_CUT_.text:
We've learned a bit more about
the properties of the crystals.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA03_000_CUT_.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA03_000_CUT_.text:
Once the earth turns to crystal, all is lost.
There will be no place left for witches of
any color to live.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA_000_CUT_01.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA_000_CUT_01.text:
Being watched like this is
all rather...unsettling.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA_000_CUT_02.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA_000_CUT_02.text: You came in and won the day.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA_000_CUT_03.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA_000_CUT_03.text: You came in and lost the fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA03_000_CUT_.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_YELLOW_AREA03_000_CUT_.text: Alas, I shall also turn to crystal...

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_C.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_C.text:
I must ask you something: what kind
of fiends appeared in battle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_C.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_C.text:
Metal, you say? Alas, I believe
they were of a wood type.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_C.speaker: YellowWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YELLOW_C.text:
Exactly so. Alas, our side possesses the
power of metal, which is weak to them.
We would do well to ask for aid from
the witches of the white.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA01_000_CUT_0.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA01_000_CUT_0.text:
Calamities are the price we pay for our use
of magic, and this is why we face them.
We are witches, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA01_010_CUT_0.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA01_010_CUT_0.text:
Even if we contain this Calamity, another
will come so long as we continue to wield
our magic. And yet, what choice have we?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA02_000_CUT_0.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA02_000_CUT_0.text:
Our magic is rebounding upon us in
the form of these fiends' strength!

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA02_010_CUT_0.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA03_000_CUT_0.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA03_000_CUT_0.text:
The Leone Bianco Palazzo is the pride of
all white witches. It proves our honor,
our prestige, and our dignity, and we
will protect it no matter the cost.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA03_000_CUT_0.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WHITE_AREA03_000_CUT_0.text:
You have robbed the white witches
of our pride this day.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_CL.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_CL.text:
I must ask you something, Watcher:
what manner of fiends attacked us?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_CL.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_CL.text:
Just so! Sadly, our powers of metal are quite
weak to fire; I doubt it was mere coincidence
such fiends have appeared in our lands.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_CL.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHITE_CL.text:
Do you now? I think it might
be the opposite, in fact.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA01_000_CUT_00.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA01_000_CUT_00.text:
As magic is used, stagnation builds
little by little. And sometimes,
it must be cut out at its root.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA01_010_CUT_00.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA01_010_CUT_00.text:
The crystals have their own kind of beauty,
but it is no match for the beauty of life.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA02_000_CUT_00.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA02_000_CUT_00.text: Are we blue witches the ones being excised? For from the crystals' point of view, perhaps we are unclean.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA02_010_CUT_00.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA02_010_CUT_00.text:
If we push back the crystals, life will
begin to return. We can start anew.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA03_000_CUT_00.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA03_000_CUT_00.text:
The trees and forests are turning to crystal.
When this happens to all, time in Pulchra will
cease to be. Has that moment truly come?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA03_000_CUT_01.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_BLUE_AREA03_000_CUT_01.text: I didn't expect it to end so...

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_CLE.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_CLE.text:
Ah, I almost forgot. I would have you
answer honestly: what type of fiends
did we just fight?

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_CLE.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_CLE.text:
As I thought. Comparing that with what we've
discovered ourselves, we now see our enemies'
weakness. We've no choice but to seek the aid
of the witches of the red.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_CLE.speaker: BlueWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLUE_CLE.text:
No, I'm afraid water is what gives us witches
of the blue our strength. I implore you to
watch your enemies closely when you fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.speaker: Mysterious_Woman
Mysterious_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.text:
Weakhearted witches of the black will
be their own ruination if left alone.
Heed me well: they must not be aided.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.speaker: Mysterious_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.text:
Be not involved with witches of the blue.
They have set down roots in this land
and absorb the life force of the world.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.speaker: Mysterious_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.text:
Witches are fated to wither and die,
and it is not for you to get involved.
Indeed, to visit the Tree of the Forever
Young is to embrace your own end.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.speaker: Mysterious_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.text:
The cunning witches of the red; their ambition
blazes in places unseen. Aye, 'twould be an
easy thing for them to burn the world to ash.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.speaker: Mysterious_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.text:
Involve yourself not with witches of the red.
Instead, cover this entire castle in crystal.
It would be so simple a thing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.speaker: Mysterious_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.text:
The Dusk Pinwheel is ever moving.
This is due to the capricious nature
of the cunning witches of the yellow,
who deceive as easily as they draw breath.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.speaker: Mysterious_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.text:
Take care, Watcher, for the Dusk Pinwheel
is ever aiming for the center of the world.
Listen well, and do not approach it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.speaker: Mysterious_Woman
Mysterious_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_MYSTERIO.text:
They cry of justice, but impose their ways
on others. Leave such fallen to their own
devices, and involve yourself not with them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_YELLOW_S.speaker: UI
SUB_W02_EVAR_COMM_00_WORLDQUEST_YELLOW_S.text:
Use the Dusk Pinwheel's compass
to place the pieces in positions
that reflect the witches' castles.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_100.text:
Castle Black Swan is home
to the witches of the black.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_110.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_110.text:
To the west is Leone Bianco Palazzo,
where witches of the white, like me,
make our base.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_120.text:
To the south is the burning Flame Fortress.
A perfect place for the witches of the red.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_130.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_130.text:
The Dusk Pinwheel over there is where
the witches of the yellow reside.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_140.text:
And finally, the witches of the blue call the
Tree of the Forever Young their domicile.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_150.text:
In the center of all this is the Brilliant Tower,
where the Arch Witch maintains the balance
of mana across all of Pulchra.

SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_160.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_COMM_AMYA_000_CUT_000_160.text:
A once-in-a-generation crisis known as the
Calamity is the threat that we witches must face.
The form that it takes is different each age,
and this time we're dealing with crystallization.
